scenes.text: You wake up in your house dormitory, the sun streaming through the window. It's your first morning at Hogwarts.

choices.text: Stay in bed a bit longer

scenes.text: You strike up a conversation with a fellow first year. You feel a little less nervous about the day ahead.
You pull the covers over your head and try to snooze a bit more. Eventually, you awake, you glance at the clock, you're late for class.

choices.text: You enjoy a hearty breakfast and chat with some classmates. Peeves the poltergeist is gesturing to you to go talk to him away from your table.
Peeves tells you he is looking for some mischief makers to join his secret club.
Politely decline and go to class.
You are now a proud member of the Peeves Pests! Peeves grins, 'I'll be in touch with your first mayhemous mission soon...'
